titles.title: A resolution designating the week of September 15 through September 21, 2024, as "National Truck Driver Appreciation Week".
A resolution designating the week of September 15 through September 21, 2024, as "National Truck Driver Appreciation Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution thanks the professional truck drivers of the United States and promotes the profession of truck driving by encouraging the public to recognize National Truck Driver Appreciation Week.
